code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient c/o 3 days h/o mild deterioration of eye sight. pt is a white female retired aged 72 years. denies any smoking she is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 160 cm, Weight 78.6 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:white female retired aged 73 yrs presents with mild deterioration of eye sight for more than 10 days. she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years she does not smoke o:Height 160 cm, Weight 78.5 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
